title: Oil Fund Posts Largest Inflow Since 2020 as Iran Risk Simmers
description: An oil exchange traded fund posted its biggest daily inflow since the pandemic as investors bet that prices will continue to rally as tensions between the US and Iran simmer.
content: An oil exchange traded fund posted its biggest daily inflow since the pandemic as investors bet that prices will continue to rally as tensions between the US and Iran simmer.
